about_the_game:

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP or greater.
  • Processor: 500 MHz
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • Storage: 35 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Must be able to play MP3 files and run Steam.
